comment.body:
Hi @nofish I'm really impress by your work, but if I understand correctly the way it's work, when a visitor comes on a site, he download the whole source am I right ?

But merchant site with more or less 1 million visitor/month weight easily more than 100 GO, so how does it work then ?

> [druss](#comment_1_18ZxqaCGbPRDooxADgRwHFzddJy5BKng4Z): Hi @nofish I'm really impress by your work, but if I understand correctly the way it's work, when a visitor comes on a site, he download the whole source am I right ?
> But merchant site with more or less 1 million visitor/month weight easily more than 100 GO, so how does it work then ?

I'm answering to myself, it seems there is a "optionnal file" config which let visitor downloading only what they need, I will dig it to understand how it works.
